fields.name: tip_sdk_access_token
fields.description: The temporary TIP Editor SDK access token. You can pass the token to the ixAccessToken parameter in the SDK function InstantPage.start() for invoking the TIP Editor. To learn about how to load the TIP SDK to create instant pages, see Instant Page Editor SDK . The token is valid for 24 hours. After the token expires, you can either renew the token using /oauth2/access_token/tip_sdk/renew/ or create a new token using /oauth2/access_token/tip_sdk/create/ .
